page.title: 11INTERDENOMINATIONAL B/BRIGGS
page.content:
{Interdenominational Meetings
Bishopbriggs has its own{Council of {Churches}of which all the Churches in the district are members with the exception of the Free Church of Scotland, the Gospel Hall and Kenmure Church. The Council of Churches with its representatives from each of the involved churches meet together to find ways in which to grow closer in the understanding of each other. Members of all the churches within Bishopbriggs with the exception of the Free Church of Scotland and the Gospel Hall have{interdenominational services especially at important times in the Christian year such as{Easter}and {Christmas. All the clergy of the Bishopbriggs churches are most co-operative with all the schools in the area.
